entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9703] It is expected that FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss with a value of 61,508,281,000,000 reported in the network role http://shinhangroup.com/role/FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDetails, http://shinhangroup.com/role/AdoptionOfIfrs17InsuranceContractsSummaryOfSignificantEffectsInTheFinancialPositionDetails, http://shinhangroup.com/role/AdoptionOfIfrs17InsuranceContractsSummaryOfFinancialPositionDetails, http://shinhangroup.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfFinancialPosition, http://shinhangroup.com/role/CondensedShinhanFinancialGroupParentCompanyOnlyStatementOfFinancialPositionDetails should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, FinancialAssets with the dimension ifrs-full:CategoriesOfFinancialAssetsAxis = ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossCategoryMember and a reported value of 67,670,629,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://shinhangroup.com/role/FinancialRiskManagementClassificationByCategoriesOfFinancialAssetsDetails. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss fact are:
Period : 2022-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : KRW Decimals of FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss : -6 Decimals of FinancialAssets : -6 Rule version: 26.0.9 - d721524d20f.htm 39996

property.name: label
property.value: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
